channel.title: Veldars - Where Legends Stay
channel.description:
[CENTER][/CENTER][IMG]http://veldars.com/bin/images/banner.png[/img]
[SIZE=4][IMG]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/icon_homepage.png[/img] Website - [URL=http://"http://veldars.com"]Veldars[/URL][/SIZE]
What is Veldars? From the creators of 06Prime I represent Veldars.Veldars is a RSPS made to be advanced and unique Free to play Runescape Private Server in the industry. We have plans that's gonna make the server flawless and full of content with help from our experienced developers from the main server. Veldars - The Game, the 2nd world for the War of Fremennik which means that this isn't going to be the main world of Veldars but there's going to be 2 worlds, 1 for the main game with Eco and 2 for War of Fremennik.
[CENTER][SIZE=2][U][SIZE=4]Features[/SIZE][/U] Queen Black Dragon 15 Bosses 8 Mini-games Duel arena Tons of Dungeons Dwarf Multicannon Achievements Social Slayer (Duo Slayer) Daily Updates Fully functional bank tabs Complete clan chat system Flawless combat 23 working skills! Customizable Client 667 maps. Gambling (Dicing and flowers) Tons of fun minigames 10+ Bosses Money pouch with unlimited storage 100% Clans with real interfaces Jadinkos Real rock caverns with rocktail fishing highscores! Shooting stars Evil trees[/CENTER] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/3299d524901b36fd11bb178c0759e402.png[/img][IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/34d351d3f7a8335c12d203c115ddb4db.png[/img] Here are some of the current In-game screenshots [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/fcfc00253f04a898b493c40ef228b174.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/d512fbb17bc5af0407317ad73600e125.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/083ecdf39a4dfa1fa4af2c569e24f261.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/067adb604dfdba55fc55d2ecf3c86870.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/a18b2a7d9a2cb29d34b26f72b43694d6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/5c54310d8d90b10c3f79ceb64babd64e.png[/img]

item.title: Veldars - Where Legends Stay
item.dc:creator: @Veldars Veldars
item.description:
@Veldars wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]

[SIZE=4] Website - Veldars[/SIZE]

What is Veldars?
From the creators of 06Prime I represent Veldars.Veldars is a RSPS made to be advanced and unique Free to play Runescape Private Server in the industry. We have plans that’s gonna make the server flawless and full of content with help from our experienced developers from the main server. Veldars - The Game, the 2nd world for the War of Fremennik which means that this isn’t going to be the main world of Veldars but there’s going to be 2 worlds, 1 for the main game with Eco and 2 for War of Fremennik.

[CENTER][SIZE=2][SIZE=4]Features[/SIZE]
Queen Black Dragon
15 Bosses
8 Mini-games
Duel arena
Tons of Dungeons
Dwarf Multicannon
Achievements
Social Slayer (Duo Slayer)
Daily Updates
Fully functional bank tabs
Complete clan chat system
Flawless combat
23 working skills!
Customizable Client
667 maps.
Gambling (Dicing and flowers)
Tons of fun minigames
10+ Bosses
Money pouch with unlimited storage
100% Clans with real interfaces
Jadinkos
Real rock caverns with rocktail fishing
highscores!
Shooting stars
Evil trees[/CENTER]
